pr_title: [hpprinter] Add additional data points and refactoring

timeline.message:
Remove Binder Event and directly expose handler and move to same package.
Tidy up some code.
Add data points for Scanner function.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Refactor some items.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Add scanner and app groups and data points.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Change HPType to HPProductUsageFeatures.
Add additional feature checks.
Add additional data points for the Scanner.
Additional check for status message in the ProductStatus data.
Only run the status checkers on when the relevant channels are linked.
Check if the tray is open or empty.
Code refactoring.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Tidy up some warnings.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Added Pages Remaining Data Points.
Adjust Channel names and also made more channels advanced.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Add pages remaining data points.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Make all channels dynamic.
Add scanner data points.
Add copy data points.
Tweaks to some of the channel groups and channel names.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Update Readme with new channels and add some more information.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Update "Miss Pick" to "Missed Pick".

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Any reason these are package private vs just private? Also please make these final and primitive.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: No they should be class private; ill sort those out as well as the final and primitives for all the relevant classes.
replies.author: Cossey

timeline.author: cpmeister
cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:

+package org.openhab.binding.hpprinter.internal.api;
+
+import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNullByDefault;
+import org.w3c.dom.Document;
+import org.w3c.dom.Element;
+import org.w3c.dom.NodeList;
+
+/**
+ * The {@link HPScannerStatusFeatures} is responsible for determining what type of printer scanner
+ * status features the Web Interface supports.
+ *
+ * @author Stewart Cossey - Initial contribution
+ */
+@NonNullByDefault
+public class HPScannerStatusFeatures {
+    public static final String ENDPOINT = "/eSCL/ScannerStatus";
+
+    private final Boolean hasStatus;
+    private final Boolean hasAdf;

timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.message:
